entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 1:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
